attributes.action: Indefinite leave to Remain Duration should stay same 5 years for Everyone.
attributes.additional_details: 10 Years Route for indefinite leave to remain should not be changed from 5 years. That should stay same. At least anyone who is already in the country and on 5 years Route.
attributes.background: I am Currently a skilled Worker in the Country and I would accept Government decision to put me on 10 years Route now when am about to complete my 5 years in December. This is completely unfair for are Skilled Workers currently in country.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727372
